ghibli_design_specifications.character_design_philosophy: A modern young woman whose brilliance shows through expressive eyes and animated gestures; clothing practical but personality-filled; technology integrated naturally into design (not cyberpunk, just contemporary); Ghibli's warmth applied to digital age protagonist
ghibli_design_specifications.base_prompt_template: A character design portrait in Studio Ghibli cinematic animation style, hand-painted watercolor aesthetic with visible brushstrokes. Inspired by Chihiro from Spirited Away and Shizuku from Whisper of the Heart.

full_character_sheet_prompt.prompt_text:
A character design reference sheet in Studio Ghibli cinematic animation style (hand-painted watercolor aesthetic), full-body portrait. 

CHARACTER: Luna, an 18-year-old Latina tech prodigy, slender build, 5'4" height. Warm medium brown skin with natural texture and subtle beauty marks. Heart-shaped face with intelligent, large almond-shaped brown eyes (deep brown with gold amber flecks catching light). Expressive thick eyebrows. Shoulder-length dark brown wavy hair with auburn highlights, naturally textured, windswept with loose strands. Small beauty mark near left corner of mouth. Slight knowing smile conveying wit and intelligence.

CLOTHING: Dark gray oversized hoodie with subtle circuit pattern on sleeves, dark blue jeans with artistic patches, burgundy high-top sneakers (laces casually tied). Silver delicate bracelet with tiny book charm on left wrist (IMPORTANT: always visible). Wireless headphones draped around neck. Messenger bag with colorful coding stickers visible on shoulder strap.

POSTURE: Standing with casual confidence, weight slightly on one leg, one hand adjusting glasses, other hand holding laptop (covered in stickers). Body language conveys intelligence and approachability. Head tilted slightly with engaged expression.

ARTISTIC STYLE: Hand-painted watercolor look with visible soft brushstrokes. Warm golden hour lighting (late afternoon sun quality). Soft rim lighting highlighting character edges. Atmospheric depth with subtle bokeh background (hints of urban tech environment or warm indoor space). Warm pastel color palette with coral and teal accents. Subtle paper texture visible. Hayao Miyazaki's signature expressive eyes and emotional depth.

BACKGROUND: Soft neutral warm tones with hints of a cozy tech workspace or window light, NOT pure white.

EMOTIONAL TONE: Determined yet approachable, brilliant but relatable, witty warmth.

[NO modern harsh digital rendering, NO pure white background, NO overly sexualized design, NO generic anime style, NO text or watermarks]
